Package org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.costs

Class TimeToCostConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.costs.TimeToCostConverter
  • public class TimeToCostConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This (linear) converter turns TimeEstimates into cost estimates.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor Description

      Creates a new instance

      Convert the given TimeEstimate into a cost estimate.

      Convert the given TimeEstimate into a cost estimate without considering the fix costs.
      double getCostsPerMillisecond()
      Get the costs that incur per millisecond according to this instance.
      double getFixCosts()
      Get the fix costs, i.e., the overhead, that incur according to this instance.
